attributes.additional_details: The BBC has sold the rights to screen live Formula 1 races to SkyTV without any consultation with the people who fund it.  This is both unacceptable, unethical and grossly unfair on the people who watch and love Formula 1 and who do not have SkyTV.  Why should we have to pay a subscription to watch a sport which is sponsored by companies and when we already pay a license fee. Sign this petition and make your feelings heard with the Uk government.
